comment.body: Just get some of those peers.

@Chikan: It's really easy to say that it was an "experiment" when you get caught or when you have a lot of unwanted eyes on you and your not so good works.
And if you're not a pedo you had no reason to buy cp and sell it on here at a low price (i don't know how much that costs).                                                                                             Saying that it was an experiment is equivalent of saying that a "chikan" did what he do as a part of a prank.
